com.taobao.datax.common.util
类 DbSource

java.lang.Object
  com.taobao.datax.common.util.DbSource

public class DbSource
extends java.lang.Object

A tool class which wraps DataSource. It provides methods to create a DataSource, get data source, get database connection so that other plugins can use these methods to work easily.
This class is mainly designed to avoid problem while occurs while data source and destination is the same kind of DataBase. for usage, see MysqlReader

字段详细信息

sourceInfoMap

public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,javax.sql.DataSource> sourceInfoMap
方法详细信息

register

public static boolean register(java.lang.Class<? extends Plugin> clazz,
                               java.lang.String ip,
                               java.lang.String port,
                               java.lang.String dbname,
                               java.util.Properties p)
A synchronized static method which create DataSource.

参数：
clazz - Plugin class
ip - database host ip address
port - database port
p - Properties file.
返回：
true if create DataSource successfully, false if failed.
抛出：
java.lang.IllegalStateException

register

public static boolean register(java.lang.String key,
                               java.util.Properties p)
A synchronized static method which create DataSource. NOTE: Client must make sure all connections to the same database should share the same value a suggestion: use genKey we provide below

参数：
key - key to query database source
p - Properties file.
返回：
true if create DataSource successfully, false if failed.
抛出：
java.lang.IllegalStateException

getDataSource

public static javax.sql.DataSource getDataSource(java.lang.Class<? extends Plugin> clazz,
                                                 java.lang.String ip,
                                                 java.lang.String port,
                                                 java.lang.String dbname)
A synchronized static method which gets DataSoucre by the identification.

参数：
clazz - Plugin class
ip - database host ip address
port - database port
dbname - database name
p - Properties file.
返回：
a binded DataSource.

getDataSource

public static javax.sql.DataSource getDataSource(java.lang.String key)
A synchronized static method which gets DataSoucre by the identification.

参数：
key - unique identification binding with DataSource.
返回：
a binded DataSource.

getConnection

public static java.sql.Connection getConnection(java.lang.Class<? extends Plugin> clazz,
                                                java.lang.String ip,
                                                java.lang.String port,
                                                java.lang.String dbname)
A synchronized static method which gets database connection by the identification.

参数：
clazz - Plugin class
ip - database host ip address
port - database port
dbname - database name
返回：
a database connection.
抛出：
{@link - IllegalStateException} Cannot connect to DataBase IllegalArgumentException Connect id is not registered

getConnection

public static java.sql.Connection getConnection(java.lang.String id)
A synchronized static method which gets database connection by the identification.

参数：
id - unique identification binding with DataSource.
返回：
a database connection.
抛出：
{@link - IllegalStateException} Cannot connect to DataBase IllegalArgumentException Connect id is not registered

genKey

public static java.lang.String genKey(java.lang.Class<? extends Plugin> clazz,
                                      java.lang.String ip,
                                      java.lang.String port,
                                      java.lang.String dbname)
generate key to get DataSource NOTE: Client must make sure all connections to the same database should share the same value a suggestion: use genKey we provide below, we used MD5 encryption method.
